posts.name: Be a Better: Bladelock
posts.snipit: She approaches the ambassador with a bouquet of flowers. As he reaches for the roses, smiling and laughing, a dagger wreathed in flames with a demonic eye in the handle appears from thin air in her off-hand. The ambassador didnâ€™t have time to gasp before his throat was slit open, and the jester vanished into thin air.
